items.todoItem: Know that the Son only does the things that He sees the Father do.
Know that the Son does nothing of His own will.
Know that the Father loves the Son.
Know that the Father shows the Son all the things that He Himself does.
Know that miracles are to make men marvel.
Know that the Father judges no man.
Know that the Father has committed all judgement to His Son Jesus.
Know that the Father has given Jesus all authority to execute judgement.
